TextBlock.Text: Components: All available functioning gravity crystals, 1 white hole warp core.
Suitable warp core obtained from paired white hole and black hole warp cores within the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color>.
This will disable the <color=orange>Deep Storm Station</color> indefinitely, but this should be of little importance now.
Structure: Gravity crystals will be arranged in a compact inward lattice surrounding the warp core. Remaining external crystals to be used in stabilizing flight trajectory.
Of note: Gravity crystals insufficient to complete lattice at the front of structure. Care must be taken to minimize entry points in this section.
